document.full_text: the european central bank is in "strong vigilance" mode over inflation pressures, ecb president jean-claude trichet said on thursday, using code words to indicate an interest rate increase is probably only a month away.
document.title: trichet flags july ecb rate hike with "strong vigilance"
lines_and_colors: the european central bank is in "strong vigilance" mode over inflation pressures, ecb president jean-claude trichet said on thursday, using code words to indicate an interest rate increase is probably only a month away.
